data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Fang, Ono, Hirotsugu, Tu, Lihong (2015): A review of Solenysa spiders from Japan (Araneae, Linyphiidae), with a comment on the type species S. mellotteei Simon, 1894. ZooKeys 481: 39-56, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.481.8545, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.481.8545
